name: X-War
summary: X-WAR is a dynamic AAA first-person shooter where players can win in-game prizes through unique mechanics not found in any other game.

name: X-Wars: Clash of Zombies
summary:
Get ready for X-War: Clash of Zombies. It is time for you to rise up and fight for your survival in a zombie apocalypse in this strategy adventure!
The deadly T Virus outbreak and infected all the human race. Those dead started turning into zombies and those few survivors that have resistance in their blood turning into mutants. As a leader of mutants, you must recruit Ice Queen, Monkey King, Sword man, Twin-headed dragon and other mutants from fantasy land. Build and defend your homeland, you are the last hope! Create the strongest mutants army, join the epic battle, kill all zombies, lead us to victory!
developers: Hangzhou Moyu Network Technology Co., Ltd
publishers: Hangzhou Moyu Network Technology Co., Ltd

name: XWVM
summary: XWVM is a facilitator app to play Star Wars: X-Wing from LucasArts and Totally Games. It is a recreation of the infrastructure that runs the original missions, campaigns and cutscenes, and 3D models from scratch, (atop of the Unity game engine). At the same time, XWVM aims to rework, refine, restore, or reimagine some components of the original to make the game more appropriate for contemporary times.

name: X Wars Deluxe
summary: It's War! And you're in the middle of the conflict. Between 4 big Armies: The Orange Dragons, The Blue Knights, The Green Peace Makers and The Yellow Monsters. Lead your units to victory as the dark story unfolds. First you have to build your units, then you can order them to attack the enemy!

name: X-Wing Revival
summary:
X-Wing Revival is a fan project to create a multiplayer combat space flight sim in the style of the classic Star Wars X-Wing games, built from scratch in C++ to be compatible with modern PCs and internet play.

Basically: 90's style combat flight sim, mid 2000's graphics, built from the ground up to run on modern PCs.

name: XWing Fighter
summary: In XWing Fighter you need to pilot an X Wing aircraft in an attack on the Death Star, re-enacting the scene from the first Star Wars movie. There is a small unshielded exhaust port which you must hit directly with a torpedo. As you approach the death star numerous imperial fighters and Darth Vader himself will try to stop you. Your fighter is equipped with lasers to fight the imperial fighters and Darth Vader, and three torpedoes to use against the death star. The mission fails if you miss the death star with all three torpedoes or are destroyed by a fighter.

name: XWarShooterVR
summary: XWarShooterVR is a Sci-Fi shooter that combines powerful guns, deadly techno-magic and building your own base. Join epic 5v5 battles and prove your superiority to your opponents.

name: X-war: Clash of Zombies
summary:
Clash of Zombies is an exciting SLG with Superheroes vs Zombies theme! Besides upgrade your base to increase defense, you can also recruit the unique heroes to build your team and battle with the other players. When your base reach certain level, you can join the league and fight the league battle. The game contains raid, defense and training elements. You cannot become a master in one day in this game, the key is to be perseverant and keep at it. 
 
Do you want to recruit powerful Super Heroes to defeat Zombies in the doomsday? 
Come on to download Clash of Zombies! You can recruit more Heroes, play more interesting features than Clash of Clans!

name: Xwung
summary: Described by the author as a shmup without the shooting, xWUNG presents a retro playfield straight from the days of early arcades with vector graphics and chippy tweets and bleeps.
